name.en: Freshman English as an Introduction to Science

goal.ch:
Listening 聽力
1.能聽懂用標準口語所說的內容大意。
2.能在主題熟悉的情況下，了解大部分音檔和影片的重點。
3.能在講者陳述清晰的情況下，了解個人專業領域內的課程或演講。

SPEAKING - Spoken Production 口語發表
4.能在事先準備的情況下，就感興趣的主題進行發表，並詳盡描述內容。
5.能透過提出論點、利弊、或因果關係等方法，來表達對一個議題的看法。

SPEAKING - Spoken Interaction 口語互動
6.能以一定的流暢度、自然地進行口語互動。
7.能在努力投入的情況下，跟上並參與小組討論。

READING 閱讀
8.能快速瀏覽長篇複雜文本並掌握所需的細節。
9.能搜尋和瀏覽多個資料出處以獲取相關資訊。
10.能理解個人專業領域或感興趣主題的文本大意。
11.能了解文章作者的觀點。

WRITING寫作
12.能寫出拼字和標點符號用法正確的文章。
13.能寫出描述清楚、提供細節的文章。
14.能寫出結合多個來源想法的文章。
15.能寫出清楚的理由來支持自己的論點。
goal.en:
Listening
1. I can understand the main ideas of what is     said to me in standard spoken English. 
2. I can understand the main ideas of most        audios and videos of familiar topics.
3. I can follow a lecture or talk within my own      field if the presentation is clear.

SPEAKING - Spoken Production
4. I can give a clear, prepared presentation        about topics I am interested in and provide        detailed descriptions.
5. I can express my opinion on an issue by        giving reasons, talking about the advantages     
and disadvantages, or analyzing cause and       effect.

SPEAKING - Spoken Interaction
6. I can interact quite fluently and naturally in     conversations.
7. I can, with some effort, keep up with and        contribute to group discussions.

READING
8. I can scan quickly through long and complex  texts and find the details I want.
9. I can search and browse various sources to   obtain relevant information.
10. I can understand the main ideas of reading materials within my field of study or of my           interest.
11. I can understand the writer’s point of view   when reading an article.

WRITING
12. I can write an essay with reasonably            accurate spelling and punctuation.
13. I can write an essay with clear descriptions  and proper details.
14. I can write an essay combining the ideas      from multiple sources.
15. I can write an essay giving reasons to          support my point of view.

outline.ch:
授課內容與活動設計
第一週
課程介紹
第二週
第五章 營養學
主題：Eating well: Less Science, More Common Sense
學習活動：
(1)練習閱讀技巧：辨識偏見
(2)練習聽力技巧：辨識口頭報告裡的偏見
第三週
第五章 營養學
主題：A personalized nutrition company will use your DNA to tell you what to eat
學習活動：
(1)練習閱讀技巧：辨識偏見
(2)練習聽力的作筆記技巧：編修聽力筆記
第四週
第五章 營養學
主題：Vitamin deficiencies
學習活動：
(1)觀看單元影片
(2)練習批判思考策略：因果關係
第五週
第六章 教育
主題：From student to employee: A difficult transition
學習活動：
(1)練習閱讀技巧：為文章做大綱
(2)練習聽力技巧：聽對比鮮明的想法
第六週
第六章 教育
主題：Making my first post-college career decision
學習活動：
(1)練習閱讀技巧：為文章做大綱
(2)練習聽力的作筆記技巧：比較和對比各式各樣的主題
第七週
第六章 教育
主題：College graduate
學習活動：
(1)觀看單元影片
(2)練習批判思考策略：為自己的意見提出正當合理的理由
第八週
期中評量
第九週
第七章 地理
主題：Ocean discoveries
學習活動：
(1)練習閱讀技巧：辨識事實和意見
(2)練習聽力技巧：聽信號字詞
第十
第七章 地理
主題：Alaska’s pebble mine: Minerals vs. nature
學習活動：
(1)練習閱讀技巧：辨識事實和意見
(2)練習聽力的作筆記技巧：對所提細節做筆記
第十一週
第七章 地理
主題：The wind power debate
學習活動：
(1)觀看單元影片
(2)練習批判思考策略：整合訊息
第十二週
第八章 工程
主題：The Tacoma Narrows Bridge collapse and the lessons learned
學習活動：
(1)練習閱讀技巧：辨識反對的論點和反駁
(2)練習聽力技巧：聽因果關係
第十三週
第八章 工程
主題：How to design a student project that benefits the developing world
學習活動：
(1)練習閱讀技巧：辨識反對的論點和反駁
(2)練習聽力的作筆記技巧：對因果關係做筆記
第十四週
第八章 工程
主題：Chernobyl disaster
學習活動：
(1)觀看單元影片
(2)練習批判思考策略：做假設
第十五週
口頭報告
第十六週
期末考
第十七週
期末評量
第十八週

outline.en:
Topics ＆ Classroom Activities
Week1
Course Introduction
Week2
Unit 5 Nutritional Science
Topic: Eating well: Less Science, More Common Sense
1.Practice reading skill: recognizing bias
2.Practice listening skill: understanding bias   in a presentation
Week3
Unit 5 Nutritional Science
Topic: A personalized nutrition company will use your DNA to tell you what to eat
1.Practice reading skill: recognizing bias
2.Practice note-taking skill: editing notes
Week4
Unit 5 Nutritional Science
Topic: Vitamin deficiencies
1.Watch the unit video
2.Practice critical thinking strategy: cause and   effect relationships
Week5
Unit 6 Education
Topic: From student to employee: A difficult         transition
1.Practice reading skill: using an outline
2.Practice listening skill: listening for contrasting ideas
Week6
Unit 6 Education
Topic: Making my first post-college career          decision
1.Practice reading skill: using an outline
2.Practice note-taking skill: comparing and         contrasting multiple topics
Week7
Unit 6 Education
Topic: College graduate
1.Watch the unit video
2.Practice critical thinking strategy: justifying      your opinions
Week8
Midterm Evaluation
Week9
Unit 7 Geology
Topic: Ocean discoveries
1.Practice reading skill: recognizing facts and    opinions
2.Practice listening skill: listening for signal       words and phrases
Week10
Unit 7 Geology
Topic: Alaska’s pebble mine: Minerals vs. nature
1.Practice reading skill: recognizing facts and    opinions
2.Practice note-taking skill: taking notes on        details
Week11
Unit 7 Geology
Topic: The wind power debate
1.Watch the unit video
2.Practice critical thinking strategy: synthesizing information
Week12
Unit 8 Engineering
Topic: The Tacoma Narrows Bridge collapse and the lessons learned
1.Practice reading skill: identifying                      counterarguments and refutations
2.Practice listening skill: listening for causes and effects
Week13
Unit 8 Engineering
Topic: How to design a student project that        benefits the developing world
1.Practice reading skill: identifying                      counterarguments and refutation
2.Practice note-taking skill: taking notes on        causes and effects
Week14
Unit 8 Engineering
Topic: Chernobyl disaster
1.Watch the unit video
2.Practice critical thinking strategy:                     hypothesizing
Week15
Oral presentations
Week16
Final Exam
Week17
End-of-semester evaluation
Week18
End-of-semester evaluation

gradMethod.ch:
自學小組 30％ 
英語自學 5％
英檢鼓勵 5％
期末評量 20％
期中評量 20％
出席、課堂表現、作業和口頭報告 20％
gradMethod.en:
Guided study groups 30％
Self-learning activities 5％
English pretest and posttest 5％
Final exam 20％
Midterm evaluation 20％
Attendance, class participation, assignments,    and oral presentations 20％

flexDiscription.ch: 期末個別諮詢與回饋討論

ch: 系所:限數學系、物理學系、化學學系、光電科學與工程學系、理學院學士班、生命科學系。年級:限一年級。身份:限非交換生。
en: Department:Department of Mathematics、Department of Physics、Department of Chemistry、Department of Optics and Photonics、Joint Science Program、Department of Life Sciences only.Year:First Year only.identity:Non-Exchange Students Only.
